div.p: These panels illustrate drilldown behavior in charts. The first row shows the default implementation for drilldown, which produces the same results as explicitly specifying All for drilldown. The bottom row shows how to disable drilldown behavior for charts and how to specify a custom drilldown for a single value.

li.p:
all
Enables drilldown behavior in a chart.

none
Disables drilldown behavior in a chart.

Single value custom drilldown
Specify a custom drilldown using the linkFields, linkView, and linkSearch options.
